requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i7-6600u
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is the minimum hardware we were able to test on. The game may run on lesser hardware.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

results.name: Super Bacon Adventure the Third 2 Two Remastered

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB | AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
